name: Smiley Ghost - Flap alone in deserted place
name_original: Smiley Ghost - Flap alone in deserted place
description:
* A lonely ghost fly in a dark city. He is weak and easy to be hurter by any tower in this city. Come and guide him to fly throughout this city.

This game is very simple and very hard to master it. You touch and the ghost will fly on.

- Tap to my your ghost up
- Avoid the house
- Try to fly far far away

* You will lose if you hit the tower.

Come and try yourself how far you can touch.
Come and share your score with the world.
